name: OutOfControl
description:
Before the game by Remedy called Control was released, I become fascinated by the level design and pictures I saw being released. Like the strange things in this game, it wormed inside my mind and I had to build a level so that I could investigate it. 

Over some holidays I spent the evenings learning blender to make the custom tubes and shapes that I saw. It all went into this level with the idea that I would stop when the game come out (for then I could play the real thing, and so should you! Check out the real deal here: https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/product/control/home) 

This is just a level that I used for screenshots but decided to add some shooting. because... why not? 

Instead of the level just living on my computer, doing nothing, I thought I might as well relate it and let you have a go and let me know what you think of it. 

My inspiration come from these wallpapers that they released: http://bit.ly/ControlWP
